product.title: Sleepy Dog | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Sleepy Dog
by Harriet Ziefert

This simple, relaxing story about a little sleepy dog going to bed is a wonderful choice to read as your little one gets ready for bed. Written by teacher and early-reading expert Harriet Ziefert, the repetitive, reader-friendly vocabulary tells us all about a little sleepy dog’s nighttime routine. Sweet dreams!

Tie-in Activity: Try to develop special nighttime rituals that relax your child, whether it’s waving good-night to the moon, singing a favorite lullaby, or reading a special bedtime story. A consistent routine makes it easier for children to drift off to sleep.
